DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the effect of valsartan and perindopril on HOMA-IR Index in patients with chronic kidney disease.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Valsartan vs Perindopril on HOMA-IR Index in Patients With Chronic Kidney Disease
DOC.detailed_description: eligiable volunteers are administrated single-dose over the period I and II (crossover) of Valsartan (80mg) as of Perindopril (4mg). Every time before and after each medication, HOMA-IR index and other parameters and safety of Valsartan (80mg) and Perindopril (4mg) is performed using a blood sample and conducting some tests (vital signs, physical exam, ECG, laboratory test, etc.) respectively.
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of chronic kidney disease Serum creatinine:1~3mg/dl Diabetes Patients treated with corticosteroids or immunosuppressants BMI>30kg/m2 SP>180mmHg, DP>110mmHg Patients with serious medical problems requiring specific medical treatment
